metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Create Your Own Web SQL Database
With the small utility below, you can use AppML to create your own Web SQL database.
content.html: With the small utility below, you can use AppML to create your own Web SQL database.

content.text: Write your own SQL, or use the buttons to import existing SQL.
content.html: Write your own SQL, or use the buttons to import existing SQL.

content.text: WebSQL only works in Chrome and Safari.
content.html: WebSQL only works in Chrome and Safari.
